channel.title: No desktop icon or anything else.
channel.description: I installed the mod, played it a bit, and quit. I want to go back in, but I can't. If I start up Source SDK Base 2007 it brings me to that without the mod.

item.title: No desktop icon or anything else.
item.dc:creator: Cryhavoc
item.description:
Ryukil:

I installed the mod, played it a bit, and quit. I want to go back in, but I can’t. If I start up Source SDK Base 2007 it brings me to that without the mod.

I am having the same problem, played it yesterday, I think the game just launched after the install, but now there is no icon… :fffuuu:
The BMS folder and the game files are still at steamapps/sourcemods/BMS, is there away to create an icon for it?

Read full topic
item.source: No desktop icon or anything else.

item.title: No desktop icon or anything else.
item.dc:creator: saivert
item.description:
Did you restart Steam? The game should appear in your game list as “Black Mesa”. You can even create a desktop shortcut by right-clicking Black Mesa item and selecting “Create desktop shortcut”.

Read full topic
item.source: No desktop icon or anything else.
